mapper.select:
select count(post_no) from (select * from RECIPE_POST left join member on (RECIPE_POST.WRITER = MEMBER.USERID))
REGDATE >= to_date(sysdate-1,'yy-mm-dd') REGDATE >= to_date(sysdate-7,'yy-mm-dd') REGDATE >= to_date(sysdate-30,'yy-mm-dd')

select * from (select p.*,ROWNUM rNum from
(select u.POST_NO,TITLE,hit,THUMNAIL,BOOKMARK,WRITER,score,nickname,REGDATE from member right join
(select c.POST_NO,TITLE,hit,THUMNAIL,BOOKMARK,WRITER,score,UPDATEDATE,REGDATE from RECIPE_POST left join
(select a.post_no, nvl(round(avg(score), 2), 0) as score from RECIPE_POST a left join RECIPE_REPLY b on (b.post_no = a.POST_NO) group by a.post_no order by POST_NO desc)c on c.POST_NO=RECIPE_POST.POST_NO )u
on (WRITER=userid) order by hit desc order by hit desc order by BOOKMARK desc )p
REGDATE >= to_date(sysdate-1,'yy-mm-dd') REGDATE >= to_date(sysdate-7,'yy-mm-dd') REGDATE >= to_date(sysdate-30,'yy-mm-dd')
)where rNum >=#{startrow} and rNum <=#{endrow} order by rNum
